This is a deck

The idea is to make a stand-alone case.

It might be somewhat interactive, as a means to fully understand the argument, or tweak it in some specific way, but this is not a workbench, it is a persuasive media tool.

A Chart

For demo purposes, I'll put the bingo chart in here:

Things to Do and Notice

  1. You know you're not in England yet.
  2. You know that of course.
  3. By the way I just wanted to let you know that i lived in England for 3 months
  4. and my parents are in the army so they lived in England and Germany so I can give you an enormous amount of tips,
  5. many tips,
  6. British tips.

And That's Not All

  • Son, we live in a world that has walls,
  • and those walls have to be guarded by men with guns.
  • Who's gonna do it?
  • You?
